C

CacheManager - Class in server
 
CacheManager(int, CacheReplacementPolicy) - Constructor for class server.CacheManager
The CacheManager function is responsible for managing the cache.
CacheReplacementPolicy - Interface in server
 
challenge(String) - Method in class server.Dictionary
The challenge function receives a word and checks if it is in the dictionary in the inventions of the IOSearch session and will return its answer.
challenge(String...) - Method in class server.DictionaryManager
The query function takes a variable number of arguments, the list of books with the last argument being the word to search for.
challengeFailed() - Method in class model.GuestHandler
The challengeFailed function is called when the guest player's requested challenge failed.
challengeTrue(String[]) - Method in class model.GuestModel
The challengeTrue function is called when the client receives a message from the server that indicates that a challenge was successful.
checkAbove(Word) - Method in class model.Board
The checkAbove function checks if there is a tile or a whole word above the word provided to it.
checkCorners(Word) - Method in class model.Board
The checkCorners function checks to see if the word is placed on the board in a legal manner.
checkLeft(Word) - Method in class model.Board
The checkLeft function checks to see if there is a tile to the left of the word.
checkRight(Word) - Method in class model.Board
The checkRight function checks to see if there is a tile in the right of the word.
checkUnder(Word) - Method in class model.Board
The checkUnder function checks to see if there is a tile or a whole word below the word that is being placed.
ClientHandler - Interface in server
 
clientSocket - Variable in class model.GuestHandler
 
close() - Method in class server.BookScrabbleHandler
The close function closes the input and output streams.
close() - Method in interface server.ClientHandler
 
close() - Method in class server.MyServer
The close function is used to stop the thread from running.
closeAllFiles() - Method in class model.GuestHandler
The closeAllFiles function closes all the files that were used to communicate with the guest player.
ConnectController - Class in view
 
ConnectController() - Constructor for class view.ConnectController
 
ConnectToGameServer(String, int) - Method in class model.HostModel
The ConnectToGameServer function connects the host to a game server.
contains(String) - Method in class server.BloomFilter
The contains function checks to see if the given string is in the Bloom Filter.
create_word(String, String, String, String) - Method in class model.Player
The create_word function takes in a string, row, column and vertical/horizontal information.
createTextFields() - Method in class view.LocalPlayersInfoController
The createTextFields function creates a TextField for each player in the game.
current_player - Variable in class model.HostModel
